name: The Most Innovative Game Of Our Time
name_original: The Most Innovative Game Of Our Time
description:
Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends that you were the fastest typer, but you simply didn't know how to type? Well, have we got the game for you!

The Most Innovative Game Of All Time (or 'The MIGOAT') allows you to progress seamlessly through a complex story mode only through pressing the space bar! It's that simple! No unoriginal story tropes here! That's right! No demons, no ghosts, no rubber ducks- certainly no twist endings!

So go ahead! Try it now!
